# DVC integration

Now we can also use `git-include` shortcode for files tracked by DVC:

|                    Black (`rev=52931cb`)                    |                 Full color (`rev=869a575`)                  |
| :---------------------------------------------------------: | :---------------------------------------------------------: |
|       {{< git-include assets/dvc.svg rev=52931cb >}}        |       {{< git-include assets/dvc.svg rev=869a575 >}}        |
| [DVC logo]({{< git-include assets/dvc.svg rev=52931cb >}})  | [DVC logo]({{< git-include assets/dvc.svg rev=869a575 >}})  |
| ![DVC logo]({{< git-include assets/dvc.svg rev=52931cb >}}) | ![DVC logo]({{< git-include assets/dvc.svg rev=869a575 >}}) |
